items.title: 1 Million Stolen Credit Cards Given Away Free On Dark Web Forum
items.description: A hacker has given away a stash of 1,018,014 stolen credit cards on a dark web crime forum. What you need to know.

items.title: Hackers Share 3.9 Billion Stolen Passwords—What You Need To Know
